title: '11-times-a-night' Simon Cowell is like Christian Grey in bed – according to his EX

Simon Cowell is a "sensitive but domineering" lover who has more in common with Christian Grey than those high-waisted trousers might indicate, his ex-girlfriend Alicia Douvall has confirmed. 
The X Factor supremo managed to satisfy Alicia 11 times in one night and knew exactly "how to get inside a woman's head" when he met her at a bar in 2001, she told Closer magazine. 
"We ended up doing it 11 times in one night," she confirmed. "We started having sex and went on through the night. We slept a little bit in between but only for a few minutes." Alicia Douvall, who had a six-month fling with Simon in 2001 The ex-glamour model on Loose Women in December 2016 (Photo: ITV) 
And that's not all – while Simon hadn't yet invented the ITV talent show that would make him a global star, he did hint at what would come. 
"He would analyse my performance just like a judge on a TV show and say how there could be an improvement next time," Alicia claimed. 
It wasn't just in the bedroom where Simon's Fifty Shades Of Grey tendencies came out, either – his wardrobe was "immaculate" and filled with lots of the same items of clothing. Simon turns up to the Britain's Got Talent auditions in January 2017 (Photo: FameFlynet) 
It comes as the father of one has had to deny claims he and Katie Price hooked up during a wild night while Katie was still with her Argentinean lover, Leandro Penna. 
Rumours that he and the Pricey had enjoyed a night of passion - without the actual sex - started swirling last month, but the music mogul denied it all. 
However, Katie came right out at the weekend to admit that she DID spend the night with Simon. Simon and Katie at the British Comedy Awards (Photo: Rex) 
The model claims she went back to the X Factor supremo's mansion after an awards bash and ended up staying the night. 
Cowell strongly denies hooking up with the TV star after ex-fiancé Leandro claimed it broke up their relationship. 
And mum-of-five Katie insists the pair did not have sex - but told The Sun on Sunday they 'undressed, got into bed and had fun'. 
She told the newspaper: "We kissed and I ran my fingers through his chest hair thinking, ‘This is the first time I’ve been in bed with a proper man’." Katie and Simon have been friends for years - but insist they have never had sex (Photo: WireImage) 
Last week, Penna claimed he grew suspicious when a boozy Katie turned up at home in the morning after a "business meeting" with Cowell. 
He said Katie denied the pair had sex but then claims he found evidence in the form of text messages between the pair. 
A source close to Cowell strongly denied the pair had sex - which Katie also maintains. 
"He's been friends with Katie for years, but this is nonsense," the source said. 
Katie added: "We had fun but we did not have sex." 
Penna, 31, claimed he ended his relationship with Katie because of her "lies" about the alleged fling. 
He told The Sun: "It’s the reason I split up with her." Cowell is happily settled down with Lauren Silverman, mother of his son Eric (Photo: Getty) 
Cowell, 57, and girlfriend Lauren Silverman have a son Eric, who turns three this month, and have been together for several years.
